name: Simon Makes Jingle Jam
description:
If the game isn't recognising keyboard inputs, try refreshing the page, and then make sure to not click off the game at any point.

Simon makes Jingle Jam in this hit video game: Simon Makes Jingle Jam.

Help Simon make Jingle Jam in this video game by controlling him in a manner that makes him make the two famous flavours of Jingle Jam: Yellow and Blue!

~  Actually Useful Words  ~

  • An elf will spawn after 1 minute, if they hit you, the level restarts
  • There is one level
  • Press E at any time to drop whatever you're holding
  • You can only hold one type of item at once
  • You can hold an infinite amount of that item at once
  • Yellow berries go in the red/yellow jam mixer
  • Blue berries go in the rainbow berry mixer (jk lmao they go in the blue one obviously)
  • You pickup jars by running into the jam counters with empty hands and pressing "E"
  • All jams go in the one "Jam Bin" just above the factory
  • The factory with all the jam mixers in it as at the bottom of the map (try exploring)
  • All sounds and sound effects are from Epidemic Sound
  • This game was made in 2 days for the Yogscast Game Jam, but I didn't make the deadline because I'm a silly sausage
  • When all the jams are delivered, run to Lewis at the top of the map to win!
